fields.headline: Campsite
fields.bodyText: On the edge of a vast sand dune in the Tunisian desert, but by a natural spring and only accessible by four-wheel drive, Pansea offers camping without any noticeable element of grit. Depending on the time of year, there's heating or air-conditioning, and the tents are decorated with tribal throws and wrought-iron furniture. And, unlike classic camping holidays, entertainment is low-key, centred on a swimming pool, atmospheric local music and watching bread being cooked in the ground, under a covering of sand. Wigmore Holidays (020 7836 4999; www.aspectsoftunisia.co.uk)
